content:
Internal server error

Your Zulip chat cannot be loaded because the server is experiencing technical difficulties.

This page will reload automatically when service is restored. In the meantime, you can contact this server's administrators for support.

If you administer this server, you may want to check out the Zulip server troubleshooting guide.
@Azure IT Support: Is this in a production server, or in development?
This topic was moved here from #development help > server error by Alex Vandiver.

@Azure IT Support: OK, then this belongs here.

Did you change anything about the server recently?

Can you show:

tail -n50 /var/log/zulip/errors.log

(use a code block to paste the output in)

In general, you should start with https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/troubleshooting.html if you have problems. Which is what will also tell you that you want this stream, and that we'll want to see your error logs. :smile:
hi installl new server and restore from today's morning backup than its working fine...
I'm glad that worked! In general, it's nice to debug the error, so you can look into why it happened, and maybe prevent it from happening in the future. But good to hear you're back up and running.
